title: Emerica Proudly Presents The Provost Slim
description:
The Provost Slim:

Emerica is proud to announce the release of Collin's second shoe, The Provost Slim, a slimmed down version of his pro model, coming in at $55.

The Provost slim is both suede and canvas, featuring a thin padded tongue and collar for extra comfort, as well as one-piece toecap and ollie area for durability. Staying true to Collin’s original, the Slim is vulcanized and comes equipped with a gum rubber outsole and Triangle Tread pattern.

The Provost Slim is available now for $55 at #HigherQuality skate shops everywhere.
